entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7 except minus 12 in low lying areas.

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 13 March 2023
